Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: Given how low your weight is, I really hope you are under medical supervision while trying to gain the weight.  &#x200B;  Unfortunately the only way to actually become comfortable with the weight gain is to gain the weight and give your mind time to heal and catch up with the body.  &#x200B;  Personally, I had a big jump in weight when I was weighed this week- I've struggled to cope with that and to keep eating. What's kept me going is listing al the positives of recovery and what I'll get out of it- things like being more engaged in life, better concentration at uni, and my hair will thicken up.
